translation.key: An error occured during the operation.
translation.value: 一个错误出现在此操作过程中

translation.key: You must be logged for this operation
translation.value: 你必须登录才能使用这个操作

translation.key: Please wait 5 minutes before creating another account
translation.value: 请等待5分钟再创建其他账号

translation.key: An error occured during the creation of your account.
translation.value: 一个错误出现在创建账号的过程中

translation.key: This username is already taken by an existing account
translation.value: 这个用户名已经有了一个账号

translation.key: Your account has been created and you are now logged.
translation.value: 你的账号现在被创建了并且你已经登录账号

translation.key: You must be logged to see your rank
translation.value: 你必须登录才能看到你的排行榜

translation.key: You must be logged to see your goal
translation.value: 你必须登录才能看到你的目标

translation.key: You have already notified that {str:PlayerName} ought to be banned
You have killed a witch, +5 points
You have killed a freezer, +3 points
translation.value: 你杀死了一个冰冻者, +3分

translation.key: You have eliminated your target, +2 points

translation.value: {str:PlayerName} 进入服务器并加入游戏

translation.key: You can't join the spectators right now
translation.value: 你现在不能加入旁观者

translation.key: You can change the language of this mod using the command /language.
translation.value: 你可以在这个模式使用 /language 来修改语言

translation.key: If your language is not available, you can help with translation (/help translate).
translation.value: 如果你的语言不存在,你可以帮助我们翻译 (输入 /help translate).
InfectionClassChallengeRank 模组由 ErrorDreemurr 制作

translation.key: Based on the concept of InfectionClass mod by necropotame
translation.value: 源自 necropotame 所做的 InfectionClass mod

translation.key: No player was found with this name
translation.value: 没有任何一个玩家叫这个名字

translation.key: InfectionClass is a team game between humans and infected.
translation.value: 感染模式是一个人类与感染间的团队游戏.
所有玩家最初都是人类.

translation.key: 10 seconds later, two players become infected.
translation.value: 10 秒后,几名人类会被感染.

translation.key: The goal for humans is to survive until the army cleans the map.
translation.value: 人类的目标就是活到救援清理地图.

translation.key: The goal for infected is to infect all humans.
translation.value: 感染者的目标是感染所有人类

translation.key: Create an account on Crowdin and join a translation team:
translation.value: 在 Crowdin 上创建一个帐户并加入翻译团队︰

translation.key: For any question about the translation process, please contact us on IRC ({str:IRCAddress})
translation.value: 翻译过程中如有任何疑问，请于 IRC 联系我们 ({str:IRCAddress})

translation.key: The Engineer can build walls with his hammer to block infected.
translation.value: 工程师可以用锤子建造激光墙来阻挡感染者

translation.key: When an infected touches the wall, he dies.
translation.value: 如果一个感染碰到激光墙便会死亡

translation.key: The lifespan of a wall is {sec:LifeSpan} and walls are limited to one per player at the same time.
translation.value: 一堵墙可以保留 {sec:LifeSpan}，每个玩家同时只能拥有一堵激光墙。

translation.key: The Soldier can pose floating bombs with his hammer.
translation.value: 士兵可以用锤子摆放悬浮雷。

translation.other: 每个悬浮雷可以爆炸 {int:NumBombs} 次。

translation.key: Use the hammer to place the bombs and explode each with one click.
translation.value: 用锤子放置悬浮雷并引爆它数次。

translation.key: Bombs are limited to one per player at the same time.
translation.value: 每个玩家同时只能放置一个悬浮雷。

translation.key: The Scientist can pose floating mines with his hammer.
translation.value: 科学家可以用他的锤子设置陷阱浮雷。

translation.key: Mines are limited to {int:NumMines} per player at the same time.
translation.other: 每个玩家同时可使用 {int:NumMines} 个地雷。

translation.key: He has also grenades that teleport him.
The Sciogist can pose floating mines with his hammer.
translation.value: 融合学家可以使用他的锤子安置地雷

translation.key: He has also fire 3 time grenades . And he has a shotgun with bouncing bullets
translation.value: 他也拥有3重榴弹 . 他可以使用猎枪击退感染者

translation.key:
Additionally he can place elastic holes with the grenades.
 that explode will damage anything.
translation.value:
他还可以通过榴弹放置弹射洞.
爆炸会对所有人造成伤害.

translation.key: The Biologist has a shotgun with bouncing bullets and can create a flower-like-laser-trap by shooting with his rifle.
translation.value: 生物学家可以用霰弹枪射出跳弹，也可以用激光枪设置弹簧激光陷阱。

translation.key: The Medic can protect humans with his hammer by giving them armor.
translation.value: 医疗兵可以用他的锤子为其他人类增加护甲。

translation.key: He has also a powerful shotgun that can pullback infected.
translation.value: 他有一把强力的霰弹枪来击退被感染者。

translation.key: The Hero has a shotgun, a laser rifle and grenades.
translation.value: 英雄有霰弹枪、激光枪和榴弹枪。

translation.key: The Hero must find a flag hidden in the map.
translation.value: 英雄需要找到地图中的旗帜。

translation.key: Once taken, the flag gives 1 health point, 4 armor points, and full ammo to all humans, furthermore full health and armor to the hero.
translation.value: 一旦拿到，旗帜会给所有人类提供 1 点生命值、4 点护甲值和足量的弹药，同时英雄生命值和护盾值也会填充满。

translation.key: The hero cannot be healed by a medic, but he can withstand a thrust by an infected, an his health suffice.
translation.value: 尽管英雄不能被医疗兵治愈，但是被感染者只能通过杀死他的方式来感染他，他的生命力非常顽强。

translation.key: The Ninja can throw flash grenades that can freeze infected for three seconds.
translation.value: 忍者可以扔闪光弹，可以冻结击中的被感染者三秒。

translation.key: His hammer is replaced by a katana, allowing him to jump {int:NinjaJump} times before touching the ground.
translation.other: 他的锤子被武士刀取代，允许他触地后冲刺 {int:NinjaJump} 次。

translation.key: The Mercenary can fly using his machine gun.
translation.value: 雇佣兵可以用机枪飞行。

translation.key: He can coil explosives with his hammer that hinder infected from harming.
translation.value: 他可以用锤子设置陷阱，触发时附近的被感染者无法造成伤害。

translation.key: He can also throw poison grenades that each deal {int:NumDamagePoints} damage points during two seconds.
translation.other: 他也能扔毒炸弹，每次造成 {int:NumDamagePoints} 点伤害。

translation.key: The Sniper can lock his position in air for 15 seconds with his hammer.
translation.value: 狙击手可以用锤子在空中锁定自己位置 15 秒。

translation.key: He has also a powerful rifle that deals 30 damage points in locked position, and 10–13 otherwise.
translation.value: 在位置锁定时，激光枪能造成 30 点伤害，其他时候只能造成 10 至 13 点伤害。

translation.key: The Smoker can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 吸烟者可以用锤子感染人类，或治疗被感染者。

translation.key: He can also inflict {int:DamagePoints} damage points per second by hooking humans.
translation.value: 勾住正常人时能造成每秒 4 点伤害。

translation.key: The Boomer explodes when he attacks.
translation.value: 爆炸者在攻击的时候会自爆。

translation.key: All humans affected by the explosion become infected.
translation.value: 被炸到的人都会被感染。

translation.key: He can also inflict 1 damage point per second by hooking humans.
translation.value: 勾住正常人时能造成每秒 1 点伤害。

translation.key: The Hunter can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 猎人可以用锤子感染人类，或治疗被感染者。

translation.key: The Ghost can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 幽灵可以用锤子感染人类，或治疗被感染者。

translation.key: He is invisible, except if a human is near him, if he takes damage or if he uses his hammer.
translation.value: 他是隐身的，当人类接近他、受到伤害、使用锤子时会现身。

translation.key: The Spider can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 蜘蛛人可以用锤子感染人类，或治疗被感染者。

translation.key: When selecting any gun, his hook enters web mode.
translation.value: 切换武器时，钩爪会进入织网模式。

translation.key: Any human that touches a hook in web mode is automatically grabbed.
translation.value: 织网模式时，被勾住的人类都会被困住。

translation.key: The Spider's hook deals one damage point per second (in both modes) and can grab a human for two seconds.
translation.value: 在两种模式下，蜘蛛的钩子每秒都能造成 1 点伤害，并能困住正常人两秒。

translation.key: The Ghoul can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 食尸鬼可以用锤子感染人类，或治疗被感染者。

translation.key: He can devour all that has died close to him, which makes him stronger, faster and more resistant.
translation.value: 他可以吞食他附近的濒死者，并会使他更快，更壮，更强！

translation.key: Thereupon he digests his fodder bit by bit going back to his normal state, and besides, death bereaves him of his nourishment.
translation.value: 他会不断消耗营养值回到正常状态，此外，死亡会消耗所有营养值。

translation.key: The Slug can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 鼻涕虫可以用锤子感染人类，或治疗被感染者。

translation.key: He can make the ground and walls toxic by spreading slime with his hammer.
translation.value: 他可以用锤子向地面和墙壁投毒。

translation.key: The Slime can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 粘液可以感染人类并且可以使用锤子治疗感染

translation.key: He can make slime entity by his hammer.
translation.value: 他可以使用锤子来抛掷粘液体

translation.key: Touching the slime inflicts three damage points in three seconds on a human.
translation.value: 人类接触粘液会在3秒内造成3点伤害.

translation.key: The Undead can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 不死族可以用锤子感染人类或治愈感染

translation.key: Instead of dying, he freezes for 10 seconds.
translation.value: 他不会死,而是被冻结10秒.

translation.key: If an infected heals him, the freeze effect disappears.
translation.value: 如果有感染治疗了他,冻结效果会消失.

translation.key: The Witch can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: 女巫可以用锤子感染人类或治愈感染.

translation.key: When an infected dies, it may respawn near the Witch.
translation.value: 当一个感染者死了,他有概率出生在女巫旁边.

translation.key: If the Witch dies, she disappears and is replaced by another class of infected.
translation.value: 如果女巫死了, 她会直接变成另一种感染职业

translation.key: She can also inflict 1 damage point per second by hooking humans.
translation.value: 她用钩爪勾住正常人能造成每秒 1 点伤害.

translation.key: Use “/msg <PlayerName> <My Message>” to send a private message to this player.
translation.value: 使用“/msg <玩家名> <你的消息>”发送一条私聊消息给这名玩家

translation.key: Use “/msg !<ClassName> <My Message>” to send a private message to all players with a specific class.
translation.value: 使用“/msg !<职业名> <你的消息>”发送一条消息给所有该职业玩家

translation.key: Use “/msg !near” to send a private message to all players near you.
translation.value: 使用“/msg !near”给附近所有玩家发送消息.
使用 /help <页面名> 来选择帮助页面

translation.key: A random class will be automatically attributed to you when rounds start
translation.value: 在回合开始时,将自动为你选择随机职业

translation.key: The class selector will be displayed when rounds start
translation.value: 在回合开始时,将显示职业选择器

translation.key: Press <F3> to enable or disable hook protection
translation.value: 按下 <F3> 来启用或禁用钩索保护

translation.key: You have held a bonus area for one minute, +5 points
translation.value: 你在奖励区域已经停留1分钟, +5分

translation.key: Type “/help {str:ClassName}” for more information about your class
translation.value: 输入 “/help {str:ClassName}” 来查询当前职业的更多信息

translation.key: Funround are start! Zombies are {str:Zombie}. Humans are {str:Human}
translation.value: 有趣的一轮开始了! 僵尸是{str:Zombie}。人类是{str:Human}

translation.key: {str:PlayerName} is calling for Witch! ({int:NumCallers}/{int:NumCallersLimit}) To call witch write: /witch
translation.value: {str:PlayerName} 想要召唤女巫! ({int:NumCallers}/{int:NumCallersLimit}) 要召唤女巫输入: /witch

translation.key: white hole ready, your laser rifle now disrupts space time
translation.value: 白洞就绪, 使用你的激光枪来放置它

translation.key: white hole found, adjusting scientific parameters...
translation.value: 已经建立白洞, 正在调整你的科学参数...

当前激活地雷 {int:NumMines} 个
白洞剩余时间: {sec:RemainingTime}

translation.key: elastic hole ready, your grenade now disrupts space time
translation.value: 弹射洞就绪, 使用你的榴弹炮来放置它

translation.key: elastic hole found, finding the exit passageway!
translation.value: 已经建立弹射洞, 正在获取安全通道!

防空地雷已激活
弹射洞剩余时间: {sec:RemainingTime}

translation.key: heal boom ready, your laser rifle now disrupts space time
translation.value: 治愈爆炸就绪, 使用你的激光枪来放置它
已经取得治愈爆炸, 治疗它们...
你获得了一个冻结地雷...

translation.key: Use hammer to switch shield mode
translation.value: 使用锤子来切换盾牌模式

translation.key: The Looper has a laser wall that slows down zombies and a fast shooting low-range-laser-rifle.
translation.value: 循环者有激光墙，它可以降低僵尸的移动速度，以及一柄快速射击的低范围激光枪.

translation.key: The Catapult can use elastic grenades.
translation.value: 弹射者可以使用弹射榴弹炮.

translation.key: He also has a laser-rifle that can fire a elastic entity.
translation.value: 他还可以使用激光枪来发射一个弹射体,

translation.key: If elatic entity collide wall, floor
translation.value: 如果弹射体碰到墙壁，地板

translation.key: it will create a can't explode small elatic hole
translation.value: 它会创建一个不能爆炸的小弹射洞.

translation.key: The Police can use hammer to use shield.
translation.value: 警察可以使用锤子来触发盾牌.

translation.key: He also has a laser-rifle that can freeze zombies.
translation.value: 他还有一把激光枪，可以冻结僵尸.

translation.key: He also has a laser-rifle that can freeze zombies.
translation.value: 他还有一把激光枪，可以冻结僵尸.

translation.key: And he has a gun, damage is very high.But ammo is scarce
translation.value: 以及他有一把手枪,伤害十分的高.但是子弹量很少.

translation.key: The Reviver can protect humans with his hammer by giving them health.
translation.value: 归命师可以用锤子治疗人类，给予他们血量.

translation.key: And he has a grenades that hinder infected from harming.
translation.value: 以及他有榴弹炮可以让感染者暂时无法造成伤害.
